name: Dead_Weight
description:
Play as a definitely sane prisoner escaping with his definitely living friend from a space prison using the laser connecting your ankles as a weapon!

  • Use the laser attached to your ankle to cut through the Police!
  • Throw your definitely living cellmate to move the laser around
  • Use said laser to cut objects and throw them around!
  • Use the safety lasers of the police officers to cut even more stuff!
  • Laser-grade space prison to escape from!
  • EVERYTHING made in 48h for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam
Controls:
  • Move - WASD/Arrow Keys
  • Dash - LeftShift
  • Throw - LeftMouse Button
  • Aim - Mouse
Credits:

  • Andrea Rosini(Coder, Level Designer, UI Lead)
  • Maximilian Kinney (Story Designer, Level Designer)
  • Artem Gulyaev (Music and SFX, Story Designer, UI Artist)
  • Geumseong Han(Coder)
  • Leonard Neitzel(Coder)
  • YOU (Prisoner)

Together, we're Spaceship Softcrunch!
